overview: The Simple Catalog Website is a lightweight web application that allows users to browse products/services in a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface. The catalog will display items with images, names, descriptions, and prices. The site will be designed to work seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices.
objectives: Provide a simple platform to showcase products.
Deliver an easy-to-navigate layout with clear sections.
Keep the design minimal and fast-loading.

nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Must load quickly on standard connections.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Easy to add more products later.

userFlow: User lands on homepage → sees navigation and hero banner.
User scrolls down or clicks 'Catalog' → sees product grid.
User clicks a product (optional future feature: opens modal with details).
User scrolls down or clicks 'Contact' → sees contact info.

successMetrics.usability: Users can easily find and view products without confusion
